content.raw:
Thanks for the contribution! Our jenkins build picked up some [RaySensor_TEST](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/420/testReport/(root)/RaySensor_TEST/LaserScanResolution/) failures. Maybe the test needs to be updated?

I also tried playing around with the hokuyo model from the gazebo model database and found that the laser visuals and the topic viewer do not show the box I placed in front of it.

The `INTEGRATION_laser` test passed though.
content.html:
Thanks for the contribution! Our jenkins build picked up some RaySensor_TEST failures. Maybe the test needs to be updated?

I also tried playing around with the hokuyo model from the gazebo model database and found that the laser visuals and the topic viewer do not show the box I placed in front of it.

The INTEGRATION_laser test passed though.
